LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays project tasks grouped by category or status with filtering capabilities

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: Automatically populated with the Account ID when placed on an Account record page

property.name: accountId
property.label: Account ID
property.description: Optional Account ID to filter tasks. If recordId is available, it takes precedence.

property.name: accountId
property.label: Account ID
property.description: Optional Account ID to filter tasks. Leave blank to show all tasks or use account filter message channel.

property.name: showAccountFilter
property.label: Show Account Filter
property.description: Show the account filter dropdown in the component header

property.name: useCurrentUserAccount
property.label: Use Current User Account
property.description: When true, defaults to the logged-in user's Account if no record/account is provided (useful for Experience Cloud)

property.name: context
property.label: Context (Deprecated)
property.description: DEPRECATED: Use 'Is Salesforce Context' property instead. Set to 'portal' for Experience Cloud/Community pages or 'salesforce' for standard Salesforce pages.

property.name: isSalesforceContext
property.label: Is Salesforce Context
property.description: When checked (true), uses Salesforce navigation and shows account filter. When unchecked (false), uses portal navigation and hides account filter. Default is false (portal mode). This property takes precedence over the deprecated 'Context' property.
